Description_Rantai: based system to facilitate management and improve the efficiency of distribution companies. Ranging from purchasing, selling, management inventory, accounts receivable, & Point of Sale for management of company . Rantai automatically capture and extract sales order data, such as a customer’s past purchases from the company, as well as unstructured data such as written communications and saves it to an electronic archive.
Desctiption_Rantai_End: Rantai helps organize and manage business easily through one integrated platform called as Rantai Link. It’s Keep you connected with your partner. We gives you an innovative solution to control your business from everywhere and at anytime, everything at your fingertips.

What_Make_Us: What makes us different from others
Desc_Full_Integrated: Ranging from purchase, stock management, sales, invoicing to delivery are integrated with one system.
Desc_Sales_Order: Minimize the manual selling process, give consumers access to product information, and also able to place orders automatically.
Desc_Realtime: Stock & prices are managed efficiently, every change of stock and prices will be updated in real-time.
Desc_Smart_Erp: Implementing Enterprise resource planning (ERP) Point of Sale (POS), Sales Order Automation & Bill Due Date Reminder. Also equipped with auto backup & auto-update features.
Desc_Stock_Management: Control your stocks and returns with five methods and also purchasing planning based on the market demand.
Desc_Data_Privacy: All of important data of your business is stored on your own server.
Stay_Connected: Stay Connected With Your Business Partners
Desc_Stay_Connected: Suppliers and Costumer is connected in one application that allows you to make transaction easily.
Desc_Store_Completed: Reports and transaction history are stored completely to an digital archive (Paperless)
Desc_Realtime_Transaction: Know the updates and progress of your transaction through notification that are send automatically.

Temp_Price: Prices can change at any time
Description_Rantai_New: Rantai is a system where an organization consolidates and brings-down the entire order hierarchy to a single dashboard and minimize false order or stock mismanagement. With the system, a wellorganized process pipeline can be established including organizing and managing the flow of goods between multiple touchpoints.
Description_Rantai_New_Next: Rantai helps an organization to handle more than adequate stock at any time of point to strike a balance between demand and supply. The system also helps an organization to accelerate and streamlines the entire flow of goods to maintain a healthy level of distribution management.
Rantai_Is_1: Rantai is a comprehensive automation set of an integrated Smart ERP ecosystem that streamline and covers the entire distribution spectrum. Rantai is a system where an organization consolidates and brings down the entire order hierarchy to a single dashboard and minimizes order errors or stock mismanagement.
Rantai_Is_2: A well-organized ecosystem pipeline can be established including organizing and managing the flow of goods between multiple touchpoints. The system also helps an organization accelerate and streamlines the entire flow of goods to maintain a healthy level of distribution management.
Benefit_Explore_Desc: We're driven by quality of service and affordable pricing, but never by cutting corners.
Benefit_Integrate_Desc: Rantai will simplify any repetitive tasks that take a lot of time by automating the complex processes using real-time data to monitor key performance indicators throughout the organizations through a single web dashboard to optimizing efficiency.
Benefit_Increase_Desc: Integrating with your suppliers can make it easier to maintain an appropriate inventory level. Rantai will clearly define how visible and accessible your products and supply chain to each customer.
Benefit_Reducing_Desc: Rantai System allows the users to complete the complex tasks faster since all business operational becomes automated without having to give too much concern on the interruptions or delays that might rise in the running process.
Benefit_Improve_Desc: Rantai exclusively offers multilevel authorization and roles that provide the degree to which a user can perform a function and the data set a user can view within Rantai. We let you indicate that authorization is restricted to predefined roles or individual users.
Benefit_Consumer_Desc: Rantai ensures the quality of consumer interaction between distributors, retailers, and consumers across digital touchpoints. We provide a platform which connect distributors, retailers, and consumer in one integrated ecosystem.
Overview_Title: Always Be Aware Of What Is Happening
Features_Subtitle: Now your systems can be monitored and managed centrally.
Smart_Erp_Integration: Implement Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Point of Sale (POS), automatic sales process &reminder due bill. Also equipped with auto backup &auto update feature.
About_Desc_1: Incepted in 2019, PT Cyberindo Sinergi Sistem is a Software Development and Information Technology providing competitively priced to companies in Indonesia. PT Cyberindo Sinergi Sistem providing your company with a mobile and web-based solution to integrate its core business processes. We have different products to meet your requirements. We provide the optimum and broad solutions for your organization.
About_Desc_2: PT Cyberindo Sinergi Sistem began its business operation as a software solution providing company in January 2019. We have been enabling companies to transform their business performance and processes. Cyberindo Technologies focuses exclusively on high quality, integrated, intuitive, easily manageable, and cost-effective system development and implementation of multiple types of products. Its business applications boast impressive scalability and reliability.
